title: US Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs visits the Port of Colombo
body_lines: SLPA Chairman Dr. Prasantha Jayamanna briefs on the present and future development projects at the Port of Colombo to the US Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs Victoria Nuland and US Ambassador Julie J. Chung. SLPA’s Harbour Master Capt. Nirmal Silva is also in the pic
SLPA Chairman Dr. Prasantha Jayamanna presents a memento to the US Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs Victoria Nuland

A special US delegation led by US Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs Victoria Nuland recently made a special visit to the Port of Colombo (POC).  US Ambassador Juli J. Chung was also included in the delegation. The delegation inspected the ongoing port development projects at the Port of Colombo from the SLPA Control Tower.
